website_summaries.verdict: The Dell M115HD palmtop projector gets a boost in The Dell M115HD palmtop projector gets a boost in brightness over its predecessor, and has a good range of connection choices.
pros: Can run presentations from USB thumb drives and micro SD cards
cons: Shows scaling artifacts at its claimed native resolution

customer_reviews.title: The throw could be a bit better, as I have to set it fairly far ...
customer_reviews.text: The projector has everything I really need- reasonable lumens, a small form factor, and a mounting point to work with a tripod. The throw could be a bit better, as I have to set it fairly far back to get any kind of a reasonable size image out of it (rather annoying when doing conference booths- you basically need to set it up at the front of the booth to throw the image on the rear of the booth if you want it big enough to be readable).
customer_reviews.author: Tim Robson

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for business presentations
customer_reviews.text: Bought this projector to have something more compact for travel. I also bought the mini-tripod to go along with it. I am using it for a Powerpoint presentation that includes illustrations and photos, no video. I am using it with a Surface Pro and HDMI I'm very pleased with the product. It may not work for a major sized conference facility but for a medium sized room with florescent lighting (I give presentations in various places and this one was in a Morton building) it worked very well. I had no problem with the lumens and the resolution/crispness was superior to my old Epson. I highly recommend it for business use for up to medium sized rooms.
customer_reviews.author: R. Nuttall

customer_reviews.title: Featherweight projector is a heavyweight champion!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Remember the days of lugging the 20 lb projector through airport in a massive box? Those days are long over, but the memory is not. The Dell M115HD Mobile LED Projector is a gem, easy to use, and featherweight. Plus the projection is bright, and the operation intuitive. Thanks, Dell, for a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: Good size and decent brightness for such a small device
customer_reviews.text: this thing makes way too much noise for something so small. if you are going to market this for presenters make sure the presenters don't have to yell over it. Good size and decent brightness for such a small device. But the fan is too loud and device still gets little too hot only after few minutes of use.
customer_reviews.author: nbj A.

customer_reviews.title: Super bright!
customer_reviews.text: Very bright & clear. Lightweight. Comes with a softcase not mentioned in the description which was a plus. Long power cord which is convenient. Easily connects to separate speaker. Only downsides are that there's no battery or wifi/bluetooth connection. Overall, happy with the purchase. We use this a lot and the brightness, even in a well lit room is really good for a projector this size.
customer_reviews.author: Kaytee

customer_reviews.title: Birght but noisy
customer_reviews.text: The fan is quite noisy and tends to draw attention to it. Otherwise it's a slick little projector with plenty of brightness for a windowed meeting room with its lights off.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, far better than the $75 model that it replaced.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. A bit loud if everyone is sitting around the table. Bright enough. Blurry from viewing at an angle, when displayed on a screen. Be really careful to somehow tie it down on the table else a small tug will have it winding up on the floor and broken. Use some type of tape to secure it to the table, or at least the wires that attach to it.
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: I love it up to as big a picture as you want the quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this device had it for about 2 years now very convenient I like to use it on the go for mobile setups, I bought the stand from Walgreens for cheap and it was perfect holidays is a pod with flexible arms for a camera in that screws in at the bottom of the projector
customer_reviews.author: Jordan, C

customer_reviews.title: I recommend you bring an external set of speakers because the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, I've taken it with me on trips and it has performed flawlessly. I recommend you bring an external set of speakers because the internal ones are rather terrible. Pros: Small Relatively bright USB reader HDMI Input 720P Cons: Requires Dell Laptop PSU (haven't tried another powersupply yet) No Zoom, the distance you set it is the size it will be. There is a focus though.
customer_reviews.author: Gundam1s

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It is certainly bright enough for a daylight room and the compact size is wonderful. I only gave it 4 stars because while it will play a PowerPoint from a micro or usb, it will not run the animation in it.
customer_reviews.author: Almost Write

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Such a small little package with great results. This projector is terrific. I teach CPR 1st Aid classes and need to be mobile at times. Very happy with this unit. If I needed very large screen projection this may not suffice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tkmoonstar

customer_reviews.title: They work great and easy to pack and travel with
customer_reviews.text: Bought several of these for my sales team. They work great and easy to pack and travel with. I would give it a 5-star, except the fan is a little loud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for travel and works like a full-size projector. very easy to get started and the quality is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small and great quality. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Small and great quality. Well worth the money! We used it to do movie nights on the trampoline this summer. Very portable.
customer_reviews.author: mamacars

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Road Warriors.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for two of our company's road warriors and they both LOVE it. It's simply perfect for a small conference room or large office. It's not appropriate to use in a large, bright conference room, but it's not meant for that. It's perfect for a slightly dim room with about 5 or 6 people viewing the display. It fits in their laptop bag, making it very easy to get through airport security. Very good product. We will likely buy a second and third if the unit stands up well. It's been about 2 months / 4 business trips and so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: vttimwhite

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It works great and is easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It works great and is easy to take from appointment to appointment. The speaker isn't great but you probably shouldn't except it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Bright! Super light and ready to travel. Best band for the buck at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Username Hidden

customer_reviews.title: Love the size!
customer_reviews.text: So small but works so well. I used to lose half my luggage space to the old projector. Now this actually fits in my laptop bag as a carry on if I choose to.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, the size, the wight, the image quality is excellent. It also comes with a bag
customer_reviews.author: Cristobal Asenjo Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product. It's only a shame that it doesn't work directly with iphone/ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Joana F.

customer_reviews.title: the sound capabilities are pretty limited.
customer_reviews.text: I had no issues with the projecting or the image itself from the projector however, the sound capabilities are pretty limited.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best projector for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I am totally satisfied with my purchase. Very compact sized projector with 1280x800 resolution, the projection is led based which hopefully provides a better lifespan. I use HDMI to connect, in addition, good and oldie RGB connection is also available through the provided adapter. TF card can also be used. It has a USB port to power wireless adapters like chrome cast. I suggest to buy a tripod. It comes with a beatiful bag, which is a nice touch. Well the only downside I can complain is the audio. But noone should expect perfect audio performance with this form factor. You can buy a portable10W bluetooth speaker to complement your investment.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great..
customer_reviews.text: Great... wish it was a tiny bit more powerful for group presentations (we have quite a bit of natural light in our office).
customer_reviews.author: Oliver S.

customer_reviews.title: Would reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The speaker is not so good. Might as well not even have one but the image it produces is crisp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and connection. Worked perfectly for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: works awesome was able to power from inverter on camping trip
customer_reviews.text: works awesome was able to power from inverter on camping trip. really small, fits in laptop case. included vga adapter cable had issues with all colors not being represented correctly. however with third party vga>hdmi and using hdmi input worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: JIM

customer_reviews.title: perfect clear crisp and it travels.
customer_reviews.text: perfect clear crisp and it travels. This palm sized projector is perfect for my business I travel and give presentations and training seminar. It stays cool It is clear and sharp and it is compact.
customer_reviews.author: Amythyst

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: It's affordable and easy to set up. Just plug it in and you have a perfectly good HD image on your wall. Even with some light in the room, the picture is GREAT! I use it for movies, my computer, and Xbox. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Simpsonslover1988

customer_reviews.title: Great little projector
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work and it works great for doing presentations in rooms that might not already have a projector in there. The picture quality is very nice. For the price this is a steal
customer_reviews.author: Sinnik Omom

customer_reviews.title: Very cool projector, extremely portable
customer_reviews.text: Very cool projector, extremely portable, handles the resolution we need for our product demonstrations, decently bright, comes with a case and a cable that fits in a monitor port on a laptop. For what we do its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan & Christine Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Since my purchase, I use it in my Youth group sessions and Sunday School. I've have used the HDMI, Universal, USB ports as well as accessed the internal memory to show my powerpoint presentations. Along with the Dell wireless adapter dongle, I'm able to connect wirelessly.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sablan

customer_reviews.title: Neat little projector.
customer_reviews.text: We use this projector for our family movie nights and cartoons for our toddler. My only complaint is that it doesn't sit level when you extend the angle adjuster underneath. Other than that, this a great projector and suits my family's projecting needs.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Brown

customer_reviews.title: They are made good.
customer_reviews.text: I placed an order for 20 of these projector's for the office. They are made good.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible..
customer_reviews.text: Terrible...this projector only worked for about a week streaming videos before it shut down from overheating. Problem was internal fan failure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent projection, even with room lights on, easy to carry, versatile. Make yourself a favor, buy the tripode.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Toriello N.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very tiny and good projector. i love it. brighter and samaller.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a CD and a cable for a computer ...
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a CD and a cable for a computer from 2001 not 2015. It should come with everything you need to install and use on a laptop from this decade.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hand
